about.title: App Metrics
about.description: As we strongly believe in Open Science, we fully disclose the metrics that the AURORA Energy Tracker uses to calculate Carbon Emissions, Energy Usage and Labels.

main.title: AURORA Energy Tracker Dashboard
main.description: Here you can find the latest stats about the AURORA Energy Tracker mobile app.

footer.fundingNotice: This project has received funding from the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under grant agreement No. 101036418.
